entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
